actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on a mixture of 1,3,5-Triazine-2,4,6-triamine,N,N"'-Y1,2-ethane-diyl-bis Y Y Y4,6-bis-Ybutyl (1,2,2,6,6-pentamethyl-4-piperidinyl)amino?-1,3,5-triazine-2 yl? imino?-3,1-propanediyl? ? bisYN',N"- dibutyl-N',N"-bis(1,2,2,6,6-pentamethyl-4-piperidinyl)- and Butanedioic acid, dimethylester polymer with 4-hyroxy-2,2,6,6-tetramethyl-1-piperdine ethanol.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on a mixture of 1,3,5-Triazine-2,4,6-triamine,N,N'-[1,2-ethane-diyl-bis [ [ [4,6-bis-[butyl (1,2,2,6,6-pentamethyl-4-piperidinyl)amino]-1,3,5-triazine-2-yl] imino]-3,1-propanediyl] ] bis[N',N'- dibutyl-N',N'-bis(1,2,2,6,6-pentamethyl-4-piperidinyl)- and Butanedioic acid, dimethylester polymer with 4-hyroxy-2,2,6,6-tetramethyl-1-piperdine ethanol.
